definitions.definition: A plate protecting a fighting person's back.
A plate harnessed to a diver 's back, to which the gas cylinders are attached.
A metal plate on the rear of a computer 's casing, used to cover a port or slot .
A wood or metal (or glass , etc) plate that serves as a backing for an object.
A rigid metal plate inside the brake drum , which supports the wheel cylinder, brake shoes , and other parts of a drum brake .
Part of a condenser microphone that sits behind the diaphragm and which acts, in conjunction with the diaphragm, as a sort of variable capacitor .

main_definition: A plate protecting a fighting person's back.
secondary_definitions: ( underwater diving ) A plate harnessed to a diver 's back, to which the gas cylinders are attached.
A metal plate on the rear of a computer 's casing, used to cover a port or slot .
A wood or metal (or glass , etc) plate that serves as a backing for an object.
( UK , automotive ) A rigid metal plate inside the brake drum , which supports the wheel cylinder, brake shoes , and other parts of a drum brake .
Part of a condenser microphone that sits behind the diaphragm and which acts, in conjunction with the diaphragm, as a sort of variable capacitor .
